This this year in now Stormy Daniels needs very little introduction real name is Stephanie Clifford she's a porn star who claims to have had an affair with President Trump more than ten years ago Trump denies that but did authorize a payment of a hundred and thirty thousand dollars to her to stay quiet about it just a month before the election in twenty sixteen
Trump's former fixer Michael Cohen pleaded guilty to violating campaign finance law by making that payment
Will Stormy Daniels has a book out this week called full disclosure she joined me from Beverly Hills to talk about it it is a memoir about more than the night she says she slept with Trump
Everybody wanted me to write a tell all and I was like I really don't want to do that because you know that doesn't define me of course everybody knows that you know about that ethic you know Ninety seconds and uh back in two thousand six with Trump and it was like I just don't want to write a tell all because it would be a very very short book
But then you know I really didn't have an outlet to tell my side of the story obviously I went on sixty minutes and hope to do that or an interview was over three hours but once it was edited down it was only fourteen minutes and some of the really key things that I wanted to express you got cut out everybody knows what happened but nobody really knew how or why
So like you people haven't gotten the full picture of who you are
Correct and like I said how things transpired and why they happen the way they did and the way things unfold that so I just rushed the book and it was it was just my way of putting having complete control um although you know I'm Still sure that people are just going to jump straight to chapter three and I
Didn't know it might make a joke about that in the book but let's let's start with what you're talking about at the beginning you grew up in
Baton Rouge Louisiana you describe a rough childhood your mother would leave you alone for days without food or you say you were repeatedly raped at the age of nine and you were called the liar when you tried to report that sexual abuse to a guidance counselor
What are you were able to know about you and your life that you don't think that they do already know
Um basically what I just said that
I don't want to be defined by one single evening with someone that uh I met and just thought it was going to be a crazy night with a goofy TV star obviously I had no inclination as anyone else that he was going to be a politician you know I just started the book with the background because I kind of wanted everyone to get a
A feeling for where I came from but I think that like the most important thing that I wanted to get across is that
I was established and my industry as a writer and director and a feature dancer [noise] um I had this completely different life although in its own right very extraordinary and so I just wanted people to know that there was a lot more to me than just that night
What made you decide to finally come out and say this is what happened
I was silent saying nothing at all if I wasn't I Would have never signed a non disclosure I'm not stupid um and if I was going to do that
Where I came from but I think that like the most important thing that I wanted to get across is that
I was established and my industry as a writer and director and a feature dancer [noise] um I had this completely different life although in its own right very extraordinary and so I just wanted people to know that there's a lot more to me than just that night
[noise] what made you decide to finally come out and say this is what happened
I was silent saying nothing at all if I wasn't I Would have never signed a non disclosure I'm not stupid [noise] um and if I was going to do that I Would have asked for a lot more than a hundred and thirty thousand dollars once again I'm not stupid I just wanted to go away I didn't want it to affect my family or my young child
And I had a pretty successful career I'd moved behind the camera was starting to be really known and respected as a director I directed the mainstream things music videos lived in small town in Texas was very happy with you know I'm doing air quotes normal friends so this is the last thing that I Want it to come out
But then somehow got leagues and Michael Cohen started running his mouth and then they wanted me to sign additional statements that were completely false
I was fine when saying nothing but I didn't want to lie in the meantime the story was exploding everywhere and people were attacking the left and right and call me names and I just wanted to set the record straight and I just want it to be able to tell my side of the stories that people would understand where I was coming from
And at the same time all these other women were coming forward
And I just felt one day that it was the right thing to do so I did it
What do you want to happen to Michael Cohen
Um I think we're about to find out on what is the December twelve he was the
Kind of the orchestrate of this and the one who most importantly and if you read the book you'll understand what I'm saying he's the one that blew it
You know I was totally fine with saying nothing at all I was actually thrilled
And then he's the one that's already happening he broke the nondisclosure way before I did and then when he realized he'd messed up he'd just continue to do so
I think he's going to get what he deserves but on the other side of that I also am starting to have a little bit of admiration respect that he did finally come clean it met the moment that I got the call I was actually overseas in Europe when I got the call that he admitted that
I was telling the truth was a huge moment for me because I'm used to being called all kinds of named to have a pretty thick skin being in the adult entertainment business you know um but being called a liar was was really hard because I knew I was telling the truth
Will you make clear in this book that you were worried for your safety all along still are
Right that was my other reason for signing the nondisclosure which we all knew it was kind of a crappy deal I'm was because there would be a record and so I figure it's nothing could really happen to me because there are people who knew about this non disclosure now my fear lives mostly with just sort of
Crazy fans not you know directly related to the government or anything like

It was very overwhelming at first you know I was used to being able to travel alone I Would you be able to go to the
